html: day of vengeance/year of my redeemed. The Lord is a God of both justice and mercy. Yet it appears that his blessings will continue far longer (year) than his punishments (day), at least in relation to this temporal earth (see commentary on 61:2). The "year of my redeemed" may refer to the jubilee year, when Israelite slaves were freed (Lev. 25:39-40; Ex. 21:2; Deut. 15:12). When the Lord comes, we will be freed from all the bonds of our enemies and oppressors.
